**Tender Notice**
=====================================================

**Title/Titre**: Professional Media Spokesperson Training Services for Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) and Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC)

**Reference Number/Numéro de Référence**: cb-8049-71505331

**Solicitation Number/Numéro de Sollicitation**: 1000250697

**Publication Date/Date de Publipication**: 2023-08-11

**Tender Closing Date/Appel d'Offres Date de Clôture**: 2023-09-15T14:00:00

**Description du Projet**

The request for standing offers seeks to satisfy the requirement of the Departments of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) and Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) for professional media spokesperson training services on an as-and-when requested basis. ISC receives frequent high-level media inquiries related to Indigenous and Northern Affairs, which are typically directed to senior officials and experts in the National Capital Region (NCR) or other parts of Canada.

**Objectives/Objectifs**

* Develop and deliver individual and/or group media spokesperson training sessions in English and/or French for senior officials and experts
* Provide training to address sensitive and/or controversial topics
* Establish National Master Standing Offers for the requirement detailed in the RFSO to identified users across Canada

**Procurement Details/Détails de l'Appel d'Offres**

* Procurement category: SRV (Services)
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Trade Agreements: CPTPP, CFTA, and several other international trade agreements
* Regions of opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contract Information/Informations Relative aux Contrats**

* Contracting entity: Indigenous Services Canada
* Contact information:
	+ Name: Christine Madore
	+ Email: [christine.madore@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:christine.madore@sac-isc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (873) 354-1376

**Request for Standing Offers/Documents de la Demande d'Offres**

* Solicitation documents are available on the Canada Buys website (canadabuys.canada.ca)
* Refer to the attached documents for detailed requirements and instructions
